title: cmd/go: no helpful message if pkg-config fails
body:
by **blake.mizerany**: 
bradfitz and I just fought go build/test until we found out it was a pkg-config problem.

Here is the session:  https://gist.github.com/04ab93a5ded2b683d3d9

tl;dr:
The `go` command could be more verbose when pkg config fails.
